text: Jon Favreau ’ s upcoming remake of The Lion King has been lining up an impressive cast, and today Disney announced that Beyoncé herself will be playing Nala, the love interest for the film ’ s main character, Simba ( Donald Glover ). The film will also feature Chiwetel Ejiofor as Scar, James Earl Jones as Mufasa, and Alfre Woodard as Sarabi. Actors like John Oliver, Billy Eichner, Seth Rogen, and Eric André round out the cast. Disney ’ s trend of turning its animated classics into live - action remakes has been a steady part of the studio ’ s output for years now, with everything from Alice in Wonderland to Beauty and the Beast getting the treatment.
